description: To open a scene in a TSCN file in Godot Engine, select Scene → Open Scene... or Open Recent . To create a scene and save it as a TSCN file in Godot Engine, select Scene → New Scene or New Inherited Scene... . Then, select Scene → Save Scene or Save Scene As... .

TSCN files are saved in plain text, which allows developers to more easily control versions and are more easily read by humans. Typically, Godot Engine is used to open TSCN files, but they may also be viewed and modified using a text editor.
